file_content.text: You're not going to die alone, Mindi. I promise you that.
Let me guess....
Republic had something more important for you to do than worry about my dead family.
You decided that "revenge is wrong," and you're going to help me hug some puppies instead.
"Didn't want to face Sobrik alone. You're sorry, but you gave a good try."
If you don't know who sold out my poor Mindi, I don't want to hear it!
This is the list of all Imperial informants on Balmorra.
I have the names.
These are the informants. Plus, the Empire's short a few goons to follow up on anything they gave.
I have the names.
Ha! I hope you made those tyrants scream.
If that's what you're going to be like, maybe I'll just keep this list of informants to myself....
Watch your tone.
Y--you have it? You did it? Oh, Mindi, we're gonna teach those traitors a lesson....
I wish I'd met you a month ago, friend. Could have saved me and Balmorra a whole lot of hurt.
I've got the information. Do you have the cash?
What are you paying?
What? You went through all that, and now you want credits?
Fine! Take everything I have! I got no one to save it for, anyway....
Don't worry. I'm not expecting much from you.
Let me ask you something. The Republic trying to make a real difference this time? Or they still willing to sell us out?
Yeah, I'm talking to you. You lot are big with the Republic, yeah?
That's right, Master Jedi. The robes and the lightsaber don't get you automatic love here no more.
That's right. Some of us don't forgive so quick when you soldier boys leave us to the Empire.
Or am I wrong? You do work for the Republic, yeah?
Ach! I shouldn't jump on you. It's not like we haven't been just as rotten to ourselves....
Sounds like there's a story here....
Are you getting at something?
I know it's been hard.
Don't patronize me.
This is none of my business.
I got nothing to be ashamed of. I'm not the one who turned my neighbors over to the Empire!
I've been doing the right thing, what the Republic told us. Hold the line, fight the fight. Led a few attacks myself.
But when my wife and kids get kidnapped? Sold to the Empire by my own neighbors? Who's there then?
I'm there. Where's your family being held?
I'll help you.
I'm sorry.
I tried to rescue them, but I couldn't get near before....
Why aren't you rescuing them?
My family is dead. Executed as traitors.
The only thing I can do for them now is find which traitors sold them out, and make sure they suffer.
Making them suffer won't bring back your family.
Revenge won't help.
But finding out who they are... making sure they can't do it again....
And after that? Will their deaths fill the emptiness inside you?
Revenge won't help.
It's not just revenge, Master Jedi. It's keeping this from happening to every Balmorran who cares about freedom.
I know Jedi are peaceable and all, but these people, they're helping the Empire terrorize us!
I just want someone to get into Imperial records in Sobrik before they delete them. Find out the names of their informants. So they don't get away with their crimes.
People should know there's a price for collaborating with the Empire.
They must be taught a lesson.
And it's higher than what the Empire will pay them!
I'm pretty good at ferreting out information if I've got something to go on.
You know where to look?
I know where the information is; I just don't have the guns to get it.
I can do it.
Hmph. Maybe you're a better lot than I gave you credit for.
Hmph. Maybe you're a better sort than I gave you credit for.
Empire's got computers in Sobrik, got the names of every informant on file. If you get those to me, I'll make sure they're exposed.
And I bet you can put some hurt on a few Imperial "extradition teams" in the process....
I can't do it. [Refuse quest]
Is it too much to ask for some justice?
Republic abandoned us once. Why should we trust them now?
"Didn't want to face the Empire alone. You're sorry, but you gave a good try."
Empire's got the names of every informant on file at a camp nearby. If you get those to me, I'll make sure they're exposed.
